subject: FW: Remote Plus app additional videos

action.text: Chris Paradowski assigned to Glen Tenorio
Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Chris Paradowski

full_threads.body:
Hi Chris,

Please find below from Irene:

"If it helps to upload the other videos now please go ahead. - I'll leave it to you to notify Wolf IQ of this. (If they use the link below they should have access.)
These will be the videos which I'll build into our eDM on the 9 Jan 2024.
There is no issue with saving them now in the marketing catalogue also.


Here is the link:


Walk Through Videos

But if the rest on here can't be done till the 8 Jan, that is fine. As long as that first video sent earlier is uploaded today with the 3 files please.

Thank you,
Christine

From: Kalligeris, Irene <Irene.Kalligeris@sonova.com>
Sent: Friday, December 22, 2023 1:15 PM
To: Salvador, Christine <Christine.Salvador@unitron.com>
Cc: Sinclair, Cameron <Cameron.Sinclair@sonova.com>; Bai, Jadyn <Jadyn.Bai@sonova.com>
Subject: RE: Remote Plus app refresh 2023 eDM
Importance: High


Hi Christine,


If it helps to upload the other videos now please go ahead. - I'll leave it to you to notify Wolf IQ of this. (If they use the link below they should have access.)
These will be the videos which I'll build into our eDM on the 9 Jan 2024.
There is no issue with saving them now in the marketing catalogue also.


Here is the link:


Walk Through Videos


I will send the eDM through next week, it'll have a link to these videos.


Thanks.


Kind regards,


Irene Kalligeris


Head of Audiology & Product

Sonova Australia Pty Ltd AU

12 Inglewood Pl, 2153 Norwest, NSW
Mobile: 0410 464 975
Email: irene.kalligeris@sonova.com
Website: www.sonova.com




From: Salvador, Christine <Christine.Salvador@unitron.com>
Sent: Friday, December 22, 2023 12:58 PM
To: Kalligeris, Irene <Irene.Kalligeris@sonova.com>
Cc: Sinclair, Cameron <Cameron.Sinclair@sonova.com>; Bai, Jadyn <Jadyn.Bai@sonova.com>
Subject: RE: Remote Plus app refresh 2023 eDM


Hi Irene,

Please find attached edited version.

Yes please, if you can construct that and send to us.
The only hold up would be the videos - WolfIQ cannot upload these till they are back on 8 Jan, so depending on that, our send might be delayed later that week.

Please give access to the video files to Jadyn, support@wolfiq.com.au, heath@wolfiq.com.au, Eric, Cameron and myself.

Thank you,
Christine

From: Kalligeris, Irene <Irene.Kalligeris@sonova.com>
Sent: Friday, December 22, 2023 12:45 PM
To: Salvador, Christine <Christine.Salvador@unitron.com>
Cc: Sinclair, Cameron <Cameron.Sinclair@sonova.com>; Bai, Jadyn <Jadyn.Bai@sonova.com>
Subject: RE: Remote Plus app refresh 2023 eDM


Hi Christine,


Thanks for the edits.


However please update the below to read:


Eliminating the need for an activation code for a smoother activation experience





No the eDM on 9 Jan will be a new eDM. There will be links to other videos, some of the existing pdfs but a slightly different wording in the body of the eDM.
I can construct this for you if you like?
Let me know.


Thanks.




Kind regards,


Irene Kalligeris


Head of Audiology & Product

Sonova Australia Pty Ltd AU

12 Inglewood Pl, 2153 Norwest, NSW
Mobile: 0410 464 975
Email: irene.kalligeris@sonova.com
Website: www.sonova.com




From: Salvador, Christine <Christine.Salvador@unitron.com>
Sent: Friday, December 22, 2023 12:38 PM
To: Kalligeris, Irene <Irene.Kalligeris@sonova.com>
Cc: Sinclair, Cameron <Cameron.Sinclair@sonova.com>; Bai, Jadyn <Jadyn.Bai@sonova.com>
Subject: RE: Remote Plus app refresh 2023 eDM


Thanks Irene,

Please find attached updated eDM.

I did try several times to align the word "users" but for some odd reason, the system won't allow it ☹ so I have edited that line for it to fit.

WolfIQ are currently uploading the assets for us - thank you for giving them access to the video. I think this is the best way and it gives centralised access to our customers with all the other materials.

For the second eDM on 9 Jan, are we ok to send the same eDM with an updated subject line and add to the heading "A friendly important reminder"
Please let us know if there is any other text you want to add for that 2nd eDM.

Thank you,
Christine

From: Kalligeris, Irene <Irene.Kalligeris@sonova.com>
Sent: Friday, December 22, 2023 11:50 AM
To: Salvador, Christine <Christine.Salvador@unitron.com>
Cc: Sinclair, Cameron <Cameron.Sinclair@sonova.com>; Bai, Jadyn <Jadyn.Bai@sonova.com>
Subject: RE: Remote Plus app refresh 2023 eDM
Importance: High


Hi Christine,


Please see notes below:


Please move the word 'users' to align with the text above - so positioned below 'Eliminating'.





Please delete this paragraph and replace with the below instead.



For existing Remote Plus app users, we have taken proactive measures to inform them about these changes in advance to avoid any surprises. They will receive 2 notifications prior to January 3rd 2024 through the app notifying them of the upcoming update. However, this communication will only be received by clients who have Insights and notifications activated for the Coach feature on their phones. For first time clients who open the app after the update, they will see a pop-up notification within the app to explain the update.




With regards to the video, could you please compress the file and it's preferable that it's run through the eDM. Otherwise please upload it to the Unitron Aus youtube site and run it form there please.
If we load to SpotMe people will have to log in to view this and it's too cumbersome.




Following this eDM, I'd like to send another eDM again reminding customers of this app refresh as this is quite critical.
Would it be possible for you to send out another eDM the following week say 9 Jan?


Thanks.


Kind regards,


Irene Kalligeris


Head of Audiology & Product

Sonova Australia Pty Ltd AU

12 Inglewood Pl, 2153 Norwest, NSW
Mobile: 0410 464 975
Email: irene.kalligeris@sonova.com
Website: www.sonova.com




From: Salvador, Christine <Christine.Salvador@unitron.com>
Sent: Thursday, December 21, 2023 5:27 PM
To: Kalligeris, Irene <Irene.Kalligeris@sonova.com>
Cc: Sinclair, Cameron <Cameron.Sinclair@sonova.com>; Bai, Jadyn <Jadyn.Bai@sonova.com>
Subject: RE: Remote Plus app refresh 2023 eDM
Importance: High


Hi Irene,

Please find attached updated eDM. All pdfs have been linked.
Please know that 1 button can only be linked to 1 file/URL.


Jadyn has advised that the video file is too big for upload - are you able to upload on SpotMe or some video platform, or if HQ has it uploaded to their YouTube channel? We can link it from one of these - please send us a link that we can use for the first button.


Thank you,
Christine


From: Kalligeris, Irene <Irene.Kalligeris@sonova.com>
Sent: Thursday, December 21, 2023 1:11 PM
To: Salvador, Christine <Christine.Salvador@unitron.com>
Cc: Sinclair, Cameron <Cameron.Sinclair@sonova.com>
Subject: RE: Remote Plus app refresh 2023 eDM
Importance: High


Hi Christine,


Please see attached FAQ doc.


Please send me the draft eDM once all elements have been finalised so that I can review.


Thanks.


Kind regards,


Irene Kalligeris


Head of Audiology & Product

Sonova Australia Pty Ltd AU

12 Inglewood Pl, 2153 Norwest, NSW
Mobile: 0410 464 975
Email: irene.kalligeris@sonova.com
Website: www.sonova.com




From: Salvador, Christine <Christine.Salvador@unitron.com>
Sent: Wednesday, December 20, 2023 5:53 PM
To: Kalligeris, Irene <Irene.Kalligeris@sonova.com>
Cc: Sinclair, Cameron <Cameron.Sinclair@sonova.com>
Subject: RE: Remote Plus app refresh 2023 eDM
Importance: High


Thanks Irene,

Please send the FAQ doc so we can add that in.

FYI, we have to schedule this on Friday for it to go out on 2 Jan 2024.

Thank you,
Christine

From: Kalligeris, Irene <Irene.Kalligeris@sonova.com>
Sent: Wednesday, December 20, 2023 5:02 PM
To: Salvador, Christine <Christine.Salvador@unitron.com>
Cc: Sinclair, Cameron <Cameron.Sinclair@sonova.com>
Subject: RE: Remote Plus app refresh 2023 eDM


Hi Christine,


Here is the video UH_Movie_RemotePlusapp_1920x1080_EN_V1.00.mp4

Thanks.


Kind regards,


Irene Kalligeris


Head of Audiology & Product

Sonova Australia Pty Ltd AU

12 Inglewood Pl, 2153 Norwest, NSW
Mobile: 0410 464 975
Email: irene.kalligeris@sonova.com
Website: www.sonova.com




From: Salvador, Christine <Christine.Salvador@unitron.com>
Sent: Wednesday, December 20, 2023 3:12 PM
To: Kalligeris, Irene <Irene.Kalligeris@sonova.com>
Cc: Sinclair, Cameron <Cameron.Sinclair@sonova.com>
Subject: RE: Remote Plus app refresh 2023 eDM


Hi Irene,

Thanks for the feedback and the updates.

Please find attached updated eDM. I have localised the brochures and sent them to Jadyn - the first three buttons on the eDM will need to be updated once these are received.

Can you please confirm the ID number of the video you were referring to below - I couldn't find the one with the name you included on MAM.



Thank you,
Christine

From: Kalligeris, Irene <Irene.Kalligeris@sonova.com>
Sent: Wednesday, December 20, 2023 1:44 PM
To: Salvador, Christine <Christine.Salvador@unitron.com>
Cc: Sinclair, Cameron <Cameron.Sinclair@sonova.com>
Subject: RE: Remote Plus app refresh 2023 eDM
Importance: High


Hi Christine,


Thanks for sending the draft eDM for the Remote Plus app refresh, however it unfortunately lacks support information.
We have so many resources available to us that we should be utilising these.
The attached pamphlet and overview documents will need to be localised prior to making these available in the eDM.


I'll send the FAQ doc mentioned below to you shortly, I'm working on this now. But I wanted to get this feedback to you ASAP so that you can start working on developing this eDM.


I've reworded the eDM below and attached the info that should also be included.


Please send me the second draft of this ASAP so that I can review and provide feedback.
If you have any questions, please let me know.
Thanks.
IK




DRAFT eDM


Unitron's Remote Plus app refresh available from 3 January 2024


At Unitron we have been hard at work enhancing the user experience, and we're excited to unveil a refreshed version of the Remote Plus app to empower hearing aid wearers to personalise their hearing experience like never before. Our revamped Remote Plus app brings a modern, user-centric approach along with additional features that will further elevate the personalised experience we provide.


Launch Date: January 3rd 2024
Transition: All clients with access to the Remote Plus app will be updated to the refreshed version
What's New?
• A Fresh Design: Modern and intuitive
• Enhanced Customisation: Elevating personalisation to new heights
• Choice of Modes: Advanced or Classic mode, tailored to your preference
• Eliminating the need for an activation code and ensuring a smoother activation experience for users
• New Features: Building upon the existing capabilities, with more enhancements to come!


Take a quick look at the refreshed version of the Remote Plus app here:
<insert video here - UH_Movie_RemotePlusapp_1920x1080_EN_V1.00.mp4 (available on MAM)>


We understand that change can sometimes be a challenge, but our commitment is to make this transition as seamless as possible for both you and your clients.


Support for Clients
For existing Remote Plus app users, we have taken proactive measures to inform them about these changes in advance to avoid any surprises. However, this communication would only have reached users who had activated insights and enabled Coach notifications on their phones. Two messages were sent to existing users; the first was scheduled for 20th December 2023, and the subsequent message set for 2nd January 2024.


To help you keep your clients informed about the refreshed Remote Plus app, we have a client brochure available that you can share with them.
<insert pamphlet here>


Support for HCPs
To help support you with the refreshed Remote Plus app, we have developed a helpful FAQ document and an overview brochure for HCPs.
<insert FAQ and overview doc here>


To ensure that you're well-prepared to navigate these enhancements effortlessly, an eLearning course is available below:
<insert link to eLearn>
https://learning.myunitron.com/learn/course/internal/view/elearning/4544/more-choice-with-the-refreshed-remote-plus-app




We're excited for HCPs and clients to experience the new Remote Plus app and look forward to enhancing client's personalised hearing care journey.


Should you have any questions, please feel free to contact us on 1800 212 313 or reach out to one of our friendly team members who are ready to assist.


Many thanks,
Unitron Australia


<insert TM photos and contact details>


From: Salvador, Christine <Christine.Salvador@unitron.com>
Sent: Monday, December 18, 2023 2:14 PM
To: Kalligeris, Irene <Irene.Kalligeris@sonova.com>
Subject: Remote Plus app refresh 2023 eDM


Hi Irene,

Hope you had a lovely weekend!

Please find attached first draft of the Remote Plus app refresh eDM. Please advise any updates/edits.

Can you please send through the eLearning course link for the CTA button?

Thank you,
Christine
